notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: J.T. performed the meta-analysis of all iPSC studies and genomics studies. H.A. performed the meta-analysis of epidemiological studies. C.B. designed the study and supervised J.T. and H.A. J.T., H.A., and C.B. prepared the figures. C.B. and J.T. wrote the paper. All authors have approved the submitted version.
